briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of SAGE-217 in Participants With Severe Postpartum Depression (PPD)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-controlled Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of SAGE-217 in the Treatment of Adults With Severe Postpartum Depression
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if treatment with SAGE-217 reduces depressive symptoms in females with severe postpartum depression (PPD) as compared to placebo.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline (CFB) in the 17-item Hamilton Rating Scale for Depression (HAM-D) Total Score at Day 15
